meanings.sent1: I will preslice the vegetables before cooking.
meanings.sent2: It is helpful to preslice the bread for the party.
meanings.sent3: The chef presliced the ingredients and saved time for the main cooking.
meanings.sent4: Preslicing the fruits of labor can lead to a smoother process.
meanings.sent5: Preslicing the cake made it easier to serve to the guests.

meanings.sent1: The presliced cheese made sandwich preparation faster.
meanings.sent2: She bought presliced ham for convenience.
meanings.sent3: The presliced pizza looked tempting in the store.
meanings.sent4: The presliced apples were neatly arranged in the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent5: Presliced vegetables are great for quick salads.
